a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Public social spending as share of GDP
Social spending includes, among others, the following areas: health, old age, incapacity-related benefits,
family, active labor market programmes, unemployment, and housing.

Note: Data for
general government
, which includes central, state, and local governments and social security funds.
